name: crossy-roads
description: Jump and run game inspired by this [pen](https://codepen.io/HunorMarton/pen/JwWLJo)

scripts.zip: rm -rf crossy-roads.zip; cd build && zip -vr ../crossy-roads.zip * && cd .. && rsync -av --delete --progress ./ ../../html5-games/crossy-roads --exclude '.git' --exclude 'node_modules'
